title: Open Wide
lyrics:
When I lay you down, I could see you fall in
You allowed, I saw, are we going again
So come back to the middle, come back to the middle of you
So come back to the middle, come back to the middle of you

Are you holding on to something ain't real

So relax, let go, and let it all feel



So come back to the middle, come back to the middle of you

So come back to the middle, come back to the middle of you



He said, how does that feel when you open wide

She said, what do you see when you look inside



So come back to the middle, come back to the middle of you

So come back to the middle, come back to the middle of you



Let it go, I see it flow away in all directions

Never fear, the light you shine around in all reflections



So come back to the middle, come back to the middle of you

So come back to the middle, come back to the middle of you
